name: Outbreak
description: Race against the clock and battle the undead in this co-op survival horror nightmare.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Processor: Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit Processor: Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 370 DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1000 MB available space Sound Card: Hardware Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
